sentences.cn: 在医院门诊部的例行检查

sentences.en: After examination he referred him to the outpatient clinic.
sentences.cn: 在检查以后,他把他转往门诊部.

sentences.en: He cut his hand and was treated as an outpatient at a local hospital.
sentences.cn: 他割伤了手,在当地一家医院的门诊部治疗.

sentences.en: Laparoscopy is usually performed on an outpatient basis under general anesthesia.
sentences.cn: 通常要全身麻醉下在门诊做腹腔镜.

sentences.en: Objective To design a new procedure for outpatient safe infusion.
sentences.cn: 目的:设计一种能实现安全输液的全新解决方案.

sentences.en: Objective To develop the outpatient emergency information system suitable for our hospital.
sentences.cn: 目的研制开发符合医院实际的门急诊信息系统.

sentences.en: Patients were recruited from inpatient , outpatient, and emergency department settings.
sentences.cn: 患者是从住院部 、 门诊部和急诊部招募的.

sentences.en: She received psychiatric care as an outpatient.
sentences.cn: 她作为门诊病人接受了精神科护理。

sentences.en: The hospital stops its outpatient service at six o'clock every afternoon.
sentences.cn: 这家医院每天下午六点钟停诊.

sentences.en: The outpatient program has a staff of six people.
The rate and expenditure of average outpatient is lower than employee s.
sentences.cn: 退休职工普通门诊就诊率、就诊费用相对于在职职工处于较低水平.

sentences.en: They are the outpatient department and the inpatient department.
sentences.cn: 它们是门诊部和住院部.

sentences.en: This is the outpatient department of Guangdong Provincial Hospital.
sentences.cn: 这是广东省医院门诊部.

sentences.en: This is the outpatient department of Hebei Provincial Hospital.
sentences.cn: 这是河北省医院门诊部.

sentences.en: This was done under local anesthesia, as an outpatient.
sentences.cn: 这样病人只需局部麻醉, 不用入院.

sentences.en: Treatment an outpatient basis unless severe medical problems emerge.
sentences.cn: 如无急诊情况出现,一般行门诊治疗.

trans.tran_en: someone who goes to a hospital for treatment but does not stay for the night
